message: We definitely need more people in here

Why? Maybe because there's already paleohacks.com or even a subreddit /r/paleo not to mention forums in the popular paleo blogs. The niche is already well served, unless some new approach, a new guru with new insights springs up here.
very true, paleohacks and r/paleo are full of good info

And now there's even more, a new membership-based site that says: "A free members-only guide to the Paleo world. Members receive a curated email of the best Paleo content and offerings." http://paleolithicdiet.com/utgtm
er, sorry, that is a "sharing" link that apparently will activate my own membership sooner. You may remove the identifying code after the last slash to hit the site directly and not give me credit :/
how to leave this boring group
